features: Comfort fit: The adjustable waist and active fit mean this short fits well and feels comfy
Optimized storage: Use the 360° storage system and hand pockets for any essentials-ideal for longer outings
Moisture management: The resistant woven fabric is great at wicking moisture to keep you feeling dry
Active fit: On tops and bottoms, Active fit is close fitting and lets you move. Not too tight, not too loose
2 hand pockets: Roomy pockets to keep your hands warm
360° mesh storage pocket system: A stretch waist belt with mesh pockets all around for maximum versatility and fast stowing on the go
